Tests that console is cleared via console.clear() method


Running: clearFromConsoleAPI
=== Before clear ===

console-clear-function.js:17 two
console-clear-function.js:18 three
=== After clear ===
console-clear-function.js:22 Console was cleared

Running: shouldNotClearWithPreserveLog
=== Before clear ===
console-clear-function.js:22 Console was cleared
console-clear-function.js:16 one
console-clear-function.js:17 two
console-clear-function.js:18 three
=== After clear ===
console-clear-function.js:22 Console was cleared
console-clear-function.js:16 one
console-clear-function.js:17 two
console-clear-function.js:18 three
console-clear-function.js:22 console.clear() was prevented due to 'Preserve log'
